project.name: kde
project.description: The KDE project manages the qt and kde ebuilds in gentoo

longdescription.p: The kde project manages the qt ebuilds and kde ebuilds within gentoo. Currently that includes kde applications, but these are going to be put to function specific herds as the kde project can not maintain them properly as it are too many and the kde developers do not use many of the applications. The project does however still support the teams that do manage these applications, and will ensure that they use the kde eclass where appropriate.

goals.p: The goal of the Gentoo KDE team is to provide working support for all packages supported by the KDE Project. We also support as many underlying packages as necessary in order to have a properly working KDE environment.

extraproject.name: Bleeding edge KDE
extraproject.p: We attempt to support running KDE directly from the CVS source utilizing a special set of ebuilds. They are available for download from here.

body.p: The best way to get support with KDE related issues is to address your concerns in the forums. You may also submit a bug report to the KDE team at Gentoo's Bugzilla .
